scripts.test: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p copy:vendorjs && karma start
scripts.test:firefox: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p copy:vendorjs && karma start --browsers Firefox
scripts.test:chrome: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p copy:vendorjs && karma start --browsers ChromeHeadless
scripts.test:watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && run-p copy:vendorjs && karma start --debug --no-single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.buildcss:custom: sass --load-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets scss/custom/custom.scss dist/custom.css && postcss dist/custom.css --map -o dist/custom.css
scripts.buildcss:vendor: sass scss/vendor/vendor.scss dist/vendor.css && postcss dist/vendor.css --map  -o dist/vendor.css
scripts.build:images: mkdir -p dist/images dist/img && cp img/* dist/img && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images && cp -r node_modules/uswds/src/img/* dist/img
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/scripts && npm run copy:vendorjs && npm run copy:uswdsjs && rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:production
scripts.copy:vendorjs: mkdir -p dist/scripts && concat -o dist/scripts/vendor.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js node_modules/leaflet-easybutton/src/easy-button.js node_modules/esri-leaflet/dist/esri-leaflet.js node_modules/leaflet-providers/leaflet-providers.js node_modules/leaflet.markercluster/dist/leaflet.markercluster.js node_modules/select2/dist/js/select2.full.min.js
scripts.copy:uswdsjs: mkdir -p dist/scripts && cp node_modules/uswds/dist/js/uswds.min.js dist/scripts && cp node_modules/uswds/dist/js/uswds-init.min.* dist/scripts
scripts.watch:js: mkdir -p dist/scripts && npm run copy:vendorjs && npm run copy:uswdsjs && rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:development --watch
